--- select_tablesample_with_table_alias.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers AS S TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 18,
          NameEnd: 25,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:   &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    -1,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 29,
            NameEnd: 30,
            Name:    "S",
          },
        },
        Sample: &ast.TableSample{
          TableSample: 31,
          Method:      "BERNOULLI",
          Size:        &ast.TableSampleSize{
            Lparen: 53,
            Rparen: 64,
            Value:  &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 54,
              ValueEnd: 56,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "90",
            },
            Unit: "PERCENT",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS S TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)
